pages.text: Luna loves to keep the Earth clean. Every Saturday, she grabs her recycling bag and goes to the park.
She finds a plastic bottle on the ground. 'This should be in the recycling bin!' she says.

question.text: Should plastic bottles go in the recycling bin?

pages.text: Luna puts the bottle in the right bin and smiles. She knows she's helping the planet.
The next week, Luna teaches her friends how to recycle too. Together, they make a big difference!

question.text: What did Luna teach her friends?
options: To throw trash on the ground

pages.text: Maya walks through the forest and sees a tree sparkling in the sunlight.
The tree speaks: 'Thank you for not littering. The forest stays beautiful because of kids like you!'

question.text: Is it good to keep the forest clean by not littering?

pages.text: Maya promises to plant a new tree every year.
One day, the magical tree grows flowers in the shape of hearts as a thank you.
